snippet: Offering an identification card to all New York City residents, regardless of legal status, is a brilliant idea.
abstract: Editorial supports New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio's proposal to create citywide identification cards for those who cannot get driver's licenses; says such cards, already adopted in other cities, would boost immigration rights movement and make life easier and safer for thousands.
lead_paragraph: Offering an identification card to all New York City residents, regardless of legal status, is a brilliant idea.
